english.segment1: When theres nothing left to give. I will give you more than I ever gave before. When theres nothing left left to say. Ill say it all again, but until then
english.segment2: And Ill give you my heart, say I love you. Say I love you. And Ill give you my heart, say I love you. Oh, cause I do, Jesus
english.segment3: No music to play so I sing you my own song. Come on and sing along. When theres nothing that remains. You still stay the same. Youre looking so strong
english.segment5: When theres nothing left to give. I will give you more than I ever gave before
